events.text: There's a note on the door. It's for you!

Greetings New Adventurer!
You have been assigned for mentorship under Sir Isaac the Boldhand.
Report to AG HQ to begin your training.
Welcome to the Adventurers Guild.

No way! I'm going to learn under Sir Isaac! This is a dream come true!
The Headquarters should be just a bit north of here, I should head over!
